banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: I am the donation

nodes.whoTheyAre: A seasoned logistics executive, Kevin Etter has spent 32 years in positions at UPS that range from healthcare strategy to industrial engineering. His varied expertise are now on loan to GAVI, a non-profit that increases global access to vaccines. Through his work at Gavi, he has experienced first-hand the unexpected benefits that come when companies donate what he believes are their most valuable assets: their employees.

videoData.description: Kevin Etter argues there's another way companies can support charitable organizations, apart from donating their money or goods. In this impassioned talk, Etter urges us all to expand our definition of "corporate donations" to include a company's' most valuable assets – its employees.
videoData.socialDescription: Kevin Etter argues there's another way companies can support charitable organizations, apart from donating their money or goods. In this impassioned talk, Etter urges us all to expand our definition of "corporate donations" to include a company's' most valuable assets – its employees.
